sentence: https://t.co/Waw8gcmkb4 @CWforA @YWforA — Penny Nance (@PYNance) January 26, 2022 Proclaiming that the Senate is the “our last line of defense against radical leftist SCOTUS justices,” Ohio Republican Senate candidate Josh Mandel used the opportunity to promote his own campaign.
